channel.title: DevOps on Shima Dot Dev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on Shima Dot Dev Blog

item.title: Docker Guide for Beginners: What is Docker?
item.description: In recent years, we have frequently heard the name “Docker.” The following article is a simple and easy guide to familiarize beginners with Docker and its basic concepts, along with exercises. Join us on this journey. I would like to remind you that this series consists of three posts, and two other articles titled “Docker Guide for Beginners: Key Terms in Docker” and “Docker Guide for Beginners: Defining Dockerfile, Building Images, and Running Containers” are also available.
